service: The WorkMail Message Flow API provides access to email messages as they are being sent and received by a WorkMail organization.

operations.GetRawMessageContent: Retrieves the raw content of an in-transit email message, in MIME format.

ResourceNotFoundException.base: The requested email message is not found.

refs.GetRawMessageContentResponse$messageCont: The raw content of the email message, in MIME format.

refs.GetRawMessageContentRequest$messageId: The identifier of the email message to retrieve.
